verbs.description: Putin [V: has] long dreamed of the day in which the Western trans - Atlantic alliance splintered . Trump is helping deliver that vision .
[ARG0: Putin] has [ARGM-TMP: long] [V: dreamed] [ARG1: of the day in which the Western trans - Atlantic alliance splintered . Trump is helping deliver that vision] .
Putin has long dreamed of [ARGM-TMP: the day] [R-ARGM-TMP: in which] [ARG1: the Western trans - Atlantic alliance] [V: splintered] . Trump is helping deliver that vision .
Putin has long dreamed of the day in which the Western trans - Atlantic alliance splintered . Trump [V: is] helping deliver that vision .

Putin has long dreamed of the day in which the Western trans - Atlantic alliance splintered . [ARG0: Trump] is helping [V: deliver] [ARG1: that vision] .
